text: Ba bandi bumviye Nyagasani wabo bazagororerwa ibyiza (Ijuru). Naho ba bandi batamwumviye, iyo baza kugira ibyo mu isi byose hiyongereyeho nâ€™ibindi nka byo, bari kubyicunguza (kugira ngo barokoke ibihano, ariko ntibigire icyo bibamarira). Abo bazagira ibarura ribi ndetse ubuturo bwabo ni umuriro wa Jahanamu; kandi ubwo ni bwo bushyikiro bubi
